level.text: Good time credit shall not apply to a sentence of civil contempt.
An inmate shall not earn more than eight (8) good time credits per calendar month under this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1077 (February 19, 1988); amended by District of Columbia Good Time Credits Amendment Act of 2010, effective May 17, 2011 (D.C. Law 18-372), published at 58 DCR 7 (January 7, 2011).
